description: Metadata is data about data. It’s usually a set of data that describes contextual information on another set of data. It helps to organise, find, understand and manage data.

definition.definitionText1: Metadata is data about data. It’s usually a set of data that describes contextual information on another set of data. It helps to organise, find, understand and manage data.

purpose.purposeText1: Metadata makes it much easier to find, manage and understand data.
purpose.purposeText2: For example, this glossary is full of metadata about terms. It puts terms in context and makes them easier to understand by putting definitions, purpose and related terms in a clear and consistent structure that you can search.
